note:
Hi! We're a plural system consisting of three people (more details in a Pinned post). Most of the time, a non-binary trans girl from Poland. Slowly settling into this whole "trans" thing and, as of recently, trying to figure out what it means to be plural.

We're into all sorts of geeky nonsense, including ttRPGs, game design, drawing, linguistics, martial arts.

Alicja grew up on the Internet and still kinda misses its early 2000s' iteration, despite remembering the many ways it could be awful.

We post a lot about politics, our mental health, and transness.

We try to approach people with kindness and compassion, but we're also hopelessly autistic. If we screw up, just tell us. We will do our best to do better going forward.

You may probably DM us (any of us) about anything. If you have a question or a comment, if you want to make friends, if you just want to chat.

Alicja also has a more explicitly sexual account at @oddtail

fields.name: pronouns EN
fields.value: it/its if you're cool; she/her otherwise

fields.name: pronouns PL
fields.value: to/tego if you're cool, ona/onej otherwise

fields.name: details of pronouns
fields.value: https://pronouns.page/@oddtail
